biotools.summary: Web-based implementation of the Knowledge-based FADE and Contacts model. It predicts the subset of residues responsible for the majority of a protein interface&apos,s binding free energy. Users input protein-protein or protein-DNA information for visualization of binding hot spots within the protein structure.

bioschemas.name: KFC Server
